name: diamond_distance_201708
title: Distance to Diamond Deposits
description: Distance to known diamond deposits, measured in meters.

extract_types_info.mean: average distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Gilmore, Elisabeth; Nils Petter Gleditsch, Päivi Lujala & Jan Ketil Rød, 2005. ‘Conflict Diamonds: A New Dataset’, Conflict Management and Peace Science 22(3): 257–292
